Description:
Job Description:We require experienced contractors to write guest posts for a SaaS company. 
The contractor will receive topics on a weekly basis and must submit articles on a daily basis to fulfill the requirements for the week. 
The contractor is responsible for the timely delivery of each article with attention to detail, incorporation of links, and coherent English writing. 
Contractors will be paid per piece or per word.Requirements:At least 2 years of content writing/content marketing experience.
Preferably with a SaaS or tech writing background.
Fluent in English.
Ability to commit to writing approximately 1 article a day (maybe more) 
Ability to write coherently with attention to detail Note: This is a contractual position and the payment model will be per word payment.Job Details
